name: Freedom: A Time to Reckon
description:
You assume the character of Carlos Romero, a former soldier who lives in a village situated somewhere in the Zulian region in Venezuela. One day the local guerrilla faction, known as the A.M.S. (Armed Militia Scavengers) decides to loot and pillage your village, and kill anyone who tries to stand in their way. The protagonist, Carlos, was sleeping when the faction started their raid, but he awoke when he heard the first ringing shots. From the moment he realized what was happening, he knew his life was never going to be the same. Carlos decides to join a group of courageous residents defending their homes and their lives in one of the bloodiest battles their village has ever seen!!

You'll:
  • explore the extent of the destruction and violence
  • fight the guerrilla by using a wide range of various fire weapons
  • hold conversations with civilians and paramilitary defense forces (spoken in Spanish and subtitled in English)
  • save your country from insane disimproval
  • cross fields, lakes, canyons, and deserts without getting blown up or shot
  • respawn at checkpoints and continue from there, with unlimited lives

Join the empowered, brave rebels and take the fate of the village into your own hands!
